com.cmput301.recipebot.model.beans

Class Ingredient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301.recipebot.model.beans.Ingredient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public class Ingredient
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    This class stores an Ingredient object. A Recipe object contains a list of these. It is re-used by PantryModel to save ingredients in the Pantry.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable

        android.os.Parcelable.ClassLoaderCreator<T>, android.os.Parcelable.Creator<T>

    • Field Detail

      • name

        private java.lang.String name
        The name of the ingredient. This is used to match two ingredients.

      • quantity

        private float quantity
        The quantity for for this ingredient. Could be null.

      • unit

        private java.lang.String unit
        The units that give context to the quantity. e.g. "ml", "nos.", "tbsp", "tsp", etc.
